name: TOBACCO BUTTER
description: A rich and smooth tobacco flavor with creamy butter notes that creates a luxurious vaping experience. Perfect for those who enjoy classic tobacco with a twist.

name: TOBACCO CAFÃ‰
description: An exquisite blend of premium tobacco with rich coffee notes. This sophisticated flavor delivers a perfect balance of earthy tobacco and aromatic coffee.

name: MANGO KIWI
description: A tropical paradise in every puff! Sweet, juicy mango perfectly balanced with tangy kiwi creates a refreshing and exotic vaping experience.

name: TOBACCO BISCUITS
description: A perfect blend of rich tobacco with sweet biscuit notes. This comforting flavor combines the best of both worlds for a satisfying vaping experience.

name: APPLE
description: Fresh and crisp apple flavor that delivers a natural sweetness with every puff. Perfect for those who love fruity and refreshing vaping experiences.

name: PREMIUM CIGAR
description: Rich and sophisticated cigar flavor that captures the essence of premium tobacco with deep, complex notes for the discerning vaper.

name: CIGAR CUSTARD
description: A luxurious blend of premium cigar tobacco with smooth vanilla custard. This sophisticated flavor combines the best of both worlds for an indulgent experience.

name: TOBACCO DARK
description: A mysterious and intense flavor profile with deep, dark notes that create an intriguing and satisfying vaping experience for adventurous vapers.

name: MANGO
description: Pure tropical mango flavor that transports you to paradise. Sweet, juicy, and authentic mango taste that's perfect for summer vibes.

name: MANGO BERRY
description: A delightful blend of tropical mango and mixed berries. This fruity blend offers the perfect balance of sweet mango and tangy berry flavors.

name: MILK BISCUITS
description: Creamy milk combined with sweet biscuit flavors creates a comforting and nostalgic vaping experience. Perfect for dessert lovers.

name: MIX BERRY
description: An explosion of mixed berry flavors including strawberry, blueberry, and raspberry. A perfect blend for berry enthusiasts.

name: PASSION FRUIT
description: Exotic passion fruit flavor that delivers a unique tropical experience. Sweet, tangy, and incredibly refreshing with every puff.

name: PEACH
description: Juicy and sweet peach flavor that captures the essence of ripe summer peaches. A smooth and satisfying fruity vape.

name: COLA PEPSI
description: Classic cola flavor that brings back childhood memories. Fizzy, sweet, and refreshing with that authentic cola taste.

name: ENERGY REDBULL
description: Energy drink flavor that delivers that familiar boost taste. Perfect for those who love the energizing flavor of their favorite energy drink.

name: TRIBECA CLASSIC
description: A classic tobacco blend inspired by the sophisticated tastes of Tribeca. Rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced for the refined palate.

name: WATERMELON
description: Fresh and juicy watermelon flavor that's perfect for hot summer days. Sweet, refreshing, and incredibly satisfying.
